DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to test (1) feasibility and efficiancy of new BACOPP regimen and (2) toxicity, overall response and FFTF.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility and Efficacy of BACOPP-21 for Patients > 60 Years With Intermediate or Advanced Hodgkins Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Hodgkin´s lymphoma (histologically proven) CS (PS) I and II with one of the risk factors ad 1. bulky mediastinal mass (> 1/3 maximum transverse thorax diameter) 2. extranodal involvement 3. ESR > 50 (A), > 30 (Bsymptoms) 4. 3 or more lymph node areas involved CS (PS) III and IV Written informed consent Leukocytes <3000/microl Platelets <100000/microl Hodgkin´s Disease as "composite lymphoma" Activity index (WHO) < grade 2
